title: Online Library Education Design Utilizing Constructivist-Based Critical Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Designed for in-service professionals, emphasizing workplace relevance and activity-based instruction utilizing digital tools.

learning_goals: Learners can critically analyze online library resources to select credible information.
Learners can collaboratively develop information evaluation criteria with peers through constructivist learning activities.
Learners can present information integration strategies applicable to real-world work scenarios in a project-based format.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
